name: Verify that single book's information can be retrieved via API
description: Ensure that the GET /Books/{id} endpoint returns the correct book by ID.
descriptionHtml: Ensure that the GET /Books/{id} endpoint returns the correct book by ID.

testStage.description: Ensure that the GET /Books/{id} endpoint returns the correct book by ID.
